sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import Input from './Input';
import Option from './Option';

class Form extends React.Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <form>
          <Input
            name="name"
            id="input-name"
            type="text"
            data="name-input"
          />

        <label htmlFor="description-input">
          <textarea id="description-input" data-testid="description-input" />
        </label>
        <Input
          name="attr1-input"
          type="number"
          data="attr1-input"
        />
        <Input
          name="attr2-input"
          type="number"
          data="attr2-input"
        />
        <Input
          name="attr3-input"
          type="number"
          data="attr3-input"
        />
        <Input
          name="image-input"
          type="text"
          data="image-input"
        />
        <select data-testid="rare-input">
          <Option value="normal" />
          <Option value="raro" />
          <Option value="muito raro" />

        </select>
        <Input
          name="trunfo-input"
          type="checkbox"
          data="trunfo-input"
        />
        <button
          type="submit"
          data-testid="save-button"
        >
          Adicionar Nova Carta
        </button>
      </form>
    );
  }
}

export default Form;
